tagline: Building fast, delightful products that users love.

about.bio: Frontend engineer with 5+ years crafting performant, accessible web experiences. I specialize in React, TypeScript, and modern web platforms. Passionate about design systems, developer experience, and shipping quality code.

projects.title: TaskFlow Pro
projects.short: AI-powered task management with smart prioritization and team collaboration.
projects.longText:
TaskFlow Pro is a modern task management platform that uses machine learning to help teams prioritize work intelligently.

• Built with Next.js 14, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS
• Real-time collaboration using WebSockets
• AI prioritization engine reduced planning time by 40%
• Scaled to 10K+ daily active users
• 98+ Lighthouse performance score

projects.title: Design System Kit
projects.short: Open-source component library with 50+ accessible React components.
projects.longText:
A production-ready design system used by 200+ companies.

• 50+ fully accessible components (WCAG AA+)
• Complete dark mode support
• Comprehensive Storybook documentation
• Tree-shakeable, <50KB gzipped
• 15K+ weekly npm downloads

projects.title: DevMetrics Dashboard
projects.short: Real-time analytics platform for engineering teams to track velocity and code quality.
projects.longText:
Analytics dashboard that aggregates data from GitHub, Jira, and CI/CD pipelines.

• Real-time metrics visualization with D3.js
• Integrates with 10+ developer tools
• Custom report builder with drag-and-drop
• Helped teams improve deploy frequency by 3x
• Reduced incident response time by 50%

highlights: Led redesign of core product, improving conversion by 35%
Built design system adopted across 8 product teams
Mentored 4 junior engineers, 2 promoted to mid-level
Reduced bundle size by 60% through code splitting and optimization
First frontend hire, built entire UI architecture
Shipped v1 product in 3 months with React and TypeScript
Implemented CI/CD pipeline reducing deploy time from 45min to 5min
Grew engineering team from 1 to 6 through recruiting and interviewing
Delivered 15+ client projects using React, Vue, and WordPress
Improved average Lighthouse score from 65 to 95+
Introduced accessibility audits, ensuring WCAG AA compliance

testimonials.name: Sarah Chen
testimonials.title: Product Manager @ TechCorp
testimonials.quote: Alex transformed our product with thoughtful UX and blazing-fast performance. A true full-stack product engineer.

testimonials.name: James Wilson
testimonials.title: CTO @ StartupXYZ
testimonials.quote: Best hire we made. Alex shipped our entire frontend in record time and built a foundation that scaled to millions of users.

testimonials.name: Maya Patel
testimonials.title: Designer @ Digital Agency Co
testimonials.quote: Working with Alex elevated our team's standards. Every pixel-perfect, accessible, and performant. A designer's dream collaborator.

seo.title: Alex Morgan — Frontend Engineer
seo.description: Frontend engineer building fast, delightful products. Specialized in React, TypeScript, and modern web platforms.
